profile.name: Barath Elumalai
profile.title: Software Developer
profile.summary: Results-driven Software Developer with 4+ years of experience designing and building scalable, high-performance applications using Java, Spring Boot, NodeJS,and microservices architecture. Adept at developing RESTful APIs, integrating cloud platforms (AWS), and implementing event-driven systems with Kafka. Experienced in working with diverse databases including PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, and Elasticsearch. Passionate about writing clean, efficient code and leveraging modern technologies to deliver impactful business solutions. Known for adaptability, problem-solving, and a strong drive to continuously learn and innovate.

projects.name: Cloud API Integration
projects.description: Automated Box-to-S3/DynamoDB migration using AWS Lambda, handling API limits with retries, Kafka pipelines, Redis caching, SES notifications.
projects.techStack: Java, NestJS, DynamoDB, AWS, CI/CD, BoxDev
highlights: Developed AWS Lambda functions to automate Box-to-S3/DynamoDB content migration, reducing manual intervention by 50% and preserving historical file versions
Addressed API pagination and rate limits; implemented exponential backoff and retry jitter for error-resilient data transfer
Designed event-driven microservices and pipelines using Kafka, integrating Redis for caching and session control
Implemented email (SES) and push notification modules for batch updates and operational alerts
Optimized code for scalability and applied reactive patterns with Spring WebFlux / Project Reactor where appropriate

projects.name: Automotive Retail SaaS Platform
projects.description: Developed a bulk inventory syndication system with audit logging, marketing pages, and PDF generation. Built wrapper APIs for vehicle data management and access control, documented processes in Confluence, and delivered under agile methodology using MongoDB and Elasticsearch for scalable, high-speed data handling.
projects.techStack: Java, Spring Boot, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Confluence, Redis, Jenkins
highlights: Implemented bulk inventory syndication, audit logging, marketing pages, and PDF generation
Built wrapper APIs to update bulk vehicle data and manage path permissions
Documented assigned tickets and technical details in Confluence for efficient tracking
Utilized MongoDB for JSON document storage and Elasticsearch for fast search

highlights: Integrated ChatGPT (Davinci-2) for dynamic lesson and quiz generation
